content.text:
<final>
{
  "session_header": "[SESSION_HEADER]\nTimestamp: 1000 DR, Ches 12, 09:15:00\nLocation: The Athenaeum of Whispers\nStatus: Lvl 1 Fighter | HP: 12/12 | XP: 0/300 | Gold: 10gp",
  "narrative": "Morning light filters through tall arched windows, casting long shadows across rows of towering bookshelves. The Athenaeum of Whispers lives up to its name—the silence here feels ancient, broken only by the soft shuffle of pages and the occasional whisper of scholars bent over their research.\n\nYou stand in the Grand Atrium, a circular chamber of marble and mahogany where dust motes dance in the sunlight. Ancient tomes line the walls from floor to ceiling, some so old their spines have faded to illegibility. A few other patrons dot the reading alcoves—mostly elderly scholars, a young apprentice copying texts, a cloaked figure in the corner reading something that makes them frown.\n\nThe head librarian, an elderly half-elf named Caelindis (Lvl 3), tends to a collection of scrolls behind the main desk. Her eyes lift to meet yours briefly, curious but not unfriendly.\n\nWhat draws your attention most is a locked iron door on the upper gallery—a section you've never been permitted to access. A faded plaque above it reads: *RESTRICTED: The Forgotten Depository*.",
  "planning_block": {
    "thinking": "I've finally gained access to the Athenaeum. The restricted section calls to me—whatever knowledge lies behind that iron door could be significant. But I should observe the library's layout and its patrons first. That cloaked figure seems interesting, and Caelindis might have information if I approach her respectfully.",

        "risk_level": "low"

        "risk_level": "safe"
      },

        "description": "Take a closer look at the iron door on the upper gallery",
        "risk_level": "medium"
      }
    }
  },
  "resources": "HD: 1/1, Potions: None, Exhaustion: 0",
